name: UniversalCountdown
0:
”Alexa, open Universal Countdown”
”Alexa, start Universal Countdown”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: universal countdown
des: Open the skill and ask Alexa for one of the pre-defined countdown timers. Alexa will read the into message and the countdown (10, 9, 8, ... 3, 2, 1), and then play a fun sound effect.
